row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
echo "Attaching network interface &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# to instance &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID#.."
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-attach-network-interface &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_NI_ID# -i &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# -d &UC4RB_AWS_DEV_IDX#
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Failed to attach network interface. exit $ret fi
echo Successfully attach network interface.
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "eni-attach*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &UC4RB_OUT_ATTACHMENT_ID# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_ATTACHMENT_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
